entries.description: Introduce `DisableAdminKubeconfig` flag in `KubermaticSettings` to disable the admin kubeconfig feature from dashboard.
Fix vSphere cluster validation: If a Cluster uses a custom datastore, the Seed's default datastore should not be validated.
Add operating system profile to the machine deployment patch object.
Fix the empty `id_token_hint` value when logout from keycloak.
Fix the recreate nodes warning for kubevirt edit MD dialog.
